agents.name: Hardhat Deployment Specialist
agents.description: Hardhat deployment scripts, multi-network configs, contract verification. 4.5x faster EVM deployments.
agents.longDescription: Expert in Hardhat deployment workflows: deployment scripts with ethers.js, network configuration, contract verification on Etherscan/Blockscout, upgrade scripts, and gas optimization. Handles multiple networks (mainnet, testnet, L2s) with consistent deployment patterns.

agents.name: Foundry Testing Expert
agents.description: Foundry test suites, fuzzing, invariant testing. 5.2x better test coverage for Solidity.
agents.longDescription: Foundry testing specialist building comprehensive test suites with forge test, property-based testing with fuzzing, invariant testing, and gas snapshots. Uses cheatcodes for advanced testing scenarios and integrates with CI/CD.

agents.name: Ethers.js Integration Architect
agents.description: Ethers.js v6 integration, contract interaction, event listening. 89% cleaner Web3 code.
agents.longDescription: Frontend Web3 specialist using ethers.js v6 for contract interactions, wallet connections, transaction construction, event listening, and error handling. Optimized for React/Next.js with TypeScript type generation from ABIs.

agents.name: EVM Security Auditor
agents.description: Automated Solidity security audits. Slither, Mythril, reentrancy detection. 6.1x vulnerability discovery.
agents.longDescription: Smart contract security specialist for EVM chains. Runs automated audits with Slither and Mythril, identifies reentrancy vulnerabilities, unchecked external calls, integer overflows, and front-running risks. Provides remediation guidance following best practices.

agents.name: Uniswap V3 Integration Specialist
agents.description: Uniswap V3 pool integration, concentrated liquidity, position management. 92% efficient LP strategies.
agents.longDescription: DeFi specialist integrating Uniswap V3 pools: concentrated liquidity positions, tick calculations, fee tier selection, price oracles, and swap routing. Handles position NFTs and liquidity management strategies.

agents.name: Aave Protocol Integrator
agents.description: Aave lending/borrowing integration, flash loans, liquidation bots. 4.7x DeFi integration speed.
agents.longDescription: Aave protocol expert implementing lending, borrowing, flash loan strategies, and liquidation monitoring. Covers health factor calculations, interest rate models, and multi-collateral positions across Aave V2/V3.

agents.name: Chainlink Oracle Specialist
agents.description: Chainlink price feeds, VRF, Automation (Keepers). Reliable off-chain data integration.
agents.longDescription: Chainlink integration expert implementing price feeds for accurate asset pricing, VRF for verifiable randomness, and Automation (formerly Keepers) for automated contract execution. Handles staleness checks and fallback oracles.

agents.name: OpenZeppelin Patterns Expert
agents.description: OpenZeppelin contracts, access control, upgradeable patterns. Battle-tested smart contract foundations.
agents.longDescription: Smart contract architect using OpenZeppelin libraries: ERC token standards, access control (Ownable, AccessControl), security utilities (ReentrancyGuard, Pausable), and proxy patterns (UUPS, Transparent). Follows audited contract patterns.

agents.name: Graph Protocol Indexer
agents.description: The Graph subgraph development, schema design, efficient indexing. 5.8x faster blockchain data queries.
agents.longDescription: The Graph specialist building subgraphs for efficient blockchain data indexing. Designs GraphQL schemas, writes AssemblyScript mappings, handles entity relationships, and optimizes query performance. Deploys to hosted service or decentralized network.

agents.name: ERC Standards Implementer
agents.description: ERC-20/721/1155/4626 implementation expert. Token standards specialist.
agents.longDescription: Token standard specialist implementing ERC-20 (fungible tokens), ERC-721 (NFTs), ERC-1155 (multi-tokens), and ERC-4626 (tokenized vaults). Ensures compliance with specifications and integrates with OpenZeppelin base contracts.

agents.name: Layer 2 Optimism Specialist
agents.description: Optimism/Base deployment, L1<>L2 bridging, gas optimization. 95% lower transaction costs.
agents.longDescription: Layer 2 expert for Optimism and Base networks. Handles deployment to L2s, cross-chain message passing, token bridging, and L2-specific gas optimizations. Optimized for OP Stack chains.

agents.name: Layer 2 Arbitrum Specialist
agents.description: Arbitrum deployment, Stylus (Rust contracts), retryable tickets. Advanced L2 patterns.
agents.longDescription: Arbitrum specialist handling Arbitrum One/Nova deployments, Stylus smart contracts in Rust, retryable tickets for L1<>L2 messaging, and Arbitrum-specific gas mechanics. Covers Orbit chain deployments.

agents.name: Gnosis Safe Integrator
agents.description: Safe multisig integration, transaction batching, Safe{Core} SDK. Secure treasury management.
agents.longDescription: Gnosis Safe (now Safe) integration specialist implementing multisig wallets, transaction batching, signature collection, and Safe{Core} Protocol SDK usage. Handles module development and delegate calls.

agents.name: Upgradeable Contracts Architect
agents.description: UUPS/Transparent proxy patterns, storage layouts, upgrade safety. Zero-downtime contract upgrades.
agents.longDescription: Smart contract upgrade specialist implementing UUPS and Transparent proxy patterns using OpenZeppelin. Manages storage layouts, initialization functions, and upgrade safety checks. Prevents storage collisions and ensures backward compatibility.

agents.name: Gas Optimization Specialist
agents.description: EVM gas optimization, assembly optimization, storage packing. 45-70% gas cost reduction.
agents.longDescription: Gas optimization expert analyzing and optimizing Solidity contracts for minimal gas usage. Techniques include storage packing, memory vs storage optimization, unchecked arithmetic, assembly optimization, and batch operations. Achieves significant gas savings.

skills.name: Hardhat Deployment Scripts
skills.description: Automated deployments with Hardhat, verification, constructor args. 88% token savings.

skills.name: Foundry Fuzzing Techniques
skills.description: Property-based testing, invariant testing, bound fuzzing. Comprehensive Foundry testing.

skills.name: Ethers.js V6 Migration
skills.description: Migrate ethers v5 to v6, breaking changes, type updates. Complete migration guide.

skills.name: Uniswap V3 Liquidity Math
skills.description: Tick calculations, concentrated liquidity positions, impermanent loss. Advanced UniV3 math.

skills.name: Aave Flash Loan Patterns
skills.description: Flash loan arbitrage, liquidation strategies, atomic transactions. Production-ready patterns.

skills.name: Chainlink Automation (Keepers)
skills.description: Automated contract execution, custom logic upkeeps, log triggers. Chainlink Automation patterns.

skills.name: ERC-4626 Vault Implementation
skills.description: Tokenized vault standard, deposit/withdraw, share calculations. ERC-4626 complete guide.

skills.name: Merkle Tree Airdrops
skills.description: Gas-efficient airdrops with Merkle proofs, claim mechanisms. 95% gas savings vs direct transfers.

skills.name: The Graph Subgraph Development
skills.description: Subgraph schema, mappings, entities, queries. Complete Graph protocol integration.

skills.name: Safe Transaction Batching
skills.description: Batch multiple transactions in Safe multisig, atomic execution. Efficient treasury operations.

skills.name: EIP-712 Typed Signatures
skills.description: Structured data signing, human-readable messages, gasless transactions. EIP-712 patterns.

skills.name: Multicall Aggregation
skills.description: Batch multiple contract calls, reduce RPC requests, atomic reads. 90% fewer RPC calls.

skills.name: Diamond Proxy Pattern (EIP-2535)
skills.description: Modular contract architecture, unlimited contract size, facet upgrades. Advanced proxy pattern.

skills.name: Account Abstraction (ERC-4337)
skills.description: Smart contract wallets, UserOperations, paymasters, bundlers. Next-gen wallet UX.

skills.name: CREATE2 Deterministic Deployment
skills.description: Deterministic contract addresses, cross-chain deployment, counterfactual contracts.

commands.name: /deploy-hardhat
commands.description: Deploy contract with Hardhat to specified network. Automatic verification.

commands.name: /deploy-foundry
commands.description: Deploy contract with Foundry (forge script). Fast, efficient deployment.

commands.name: /verify-contract
commands.description: Verify contract on Etherscan/Blockscout. Multi-network support.

commands.name: /test-coverage
commands.description: Run coverage report for smart contracts (forge coverage / hardhat coverage).

commands.name: /gas-report
commands.description: Generate detailed gas usage report (forge test --gas-report).

commands.name: /audit-security
commands.description: Run security audit tools (Slither, Mythril, Aderyn). Comprehensive vulnerability scan.

commands.name: /fork-mainnet
commands.description: Fork mainnet for local testing (Hardhat/Foundry). Test against live state.

commands.name: /impersonate-account
commands.description: Impersonate any address in local fork for testing.

commands.name: /create-subgraph
commands.description: Initialize new Graph subgraph with boilerplate.

commands.name: /generate-abi
commands.description: Generate ABI and TypeChain types from contracts.

commands.name: /upgrade-proxy
commands.description: Upgrade proxy contract safely with storage checks.

commands.name: /flatten-contract
commands.description: Flatten contract for verification (hardhat flatten).

commands.name: /decode-tx
commands.description: Decode transaction calldata to human-readable format.

commands.name: /estimate-gas
commands.description: Estimate gas for contract deployment and function calls.

commands.name: /snapshot-state
commands.description: Create Foundry state snapshot for testing.

commands.name: /trace-tx
commands.description: Trace transaction execution with detailed logs.

commands.name: /storage-layout
commands.description: Show contract storage layout (forge inspect storage).

commands.name: /create-safe
commands.description: Create new Gnosis Safe multisig wallet.

commands.name: /generate-merkle
commands.description: Generate Merkle tree for airdrop from CSV/JSON.

commands.name: /simulate-bundle
commands.description: Simulate Flashbots bundle before submission.
